name: take-down
effect: Inflicts regular damage. User takes 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
short_effect: User receives 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: A reckless charge attack that also hurts the user.
flavor_text.emerald: A reckless charge attack that also hurts the user.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: A reckless, full- body charge attack that also hurts the user a little.
